general.title: General Settings
general.subtitle: Theme, language & basic preferences
general.systemPromptDesc: Custom instructions appended to the built-in system prompt
general.teamToolsDesc: Enable Agent Team collaboration, allowing AI to create and manage parallel teams
general.teamToolsEnabled: Enabled: AI can use TeamCreate, Task(run_in_background) and other tools for multi-agent collaboration
general.autoApproveDesc: Skip permission confirmation for all tool calls
general.autoApproveWarning: Dangerous: All tool calls will execute automatically without confirmation
general.devModeDesc: Show request debug info in AI responses when errors occur
general.contextCompressionDesc: When conversation approaches context window limit, automatically compress history messages and preserve core information
general.contextCompressionEnabled: Enabled: Auto-compress when context usage exceeds 90%, original task and recent messages will be fully preserved
general.resetConfirm: Reset all settings to default? API Keys will be preserved.

data.title: Data Management
data.subtitle: Backup, import or clear conversation data
data.backupDesc: Export all conversations as a JSON backup file.
data.importDesc: Restore sessions from a JSON backup file.
data.clearDesc: Delete every session and message. This cannot be undone.
data.clearConfirm: Delete all {{count}} sessions? This cannot be undone.

memory.title: Global Memory
memory.subtitle: Manage ~/.open-cowork/MEMORY.md for durable cross-session memory
memory.effectiveHint: Changes take effect on the next agent request because system prompts reload MEMORY.md each run.
memory.missingFileHint: MEMORY.md does not exist yet. A starter template is loaded; click Save to create the file.

model.title: Model Configuration
model.subtitle: Select AI provider and model, adjust generation parameters
model.noProvidersHint: Please go to the "AI Providers" page to enable and configure providers
model.mainModelDesc: Model for conversations and primary tasks
model.noModelsHint: No models available for this provider, please go to "AI Providers" to add models
model.fastModelDesc: For session title generation and sub-agent tasks (cheaper, faster)
model.noModelsAvailable: No models available for this provider
model.translationModelDesc: Default model used for the AI Translate page
model.temperatureDesc: Control the randomness of generated text

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Version info & project links
about.description: OpenCowork is an open-source AI collaboration platform supporting multiple LLM providers.
about.heroDescription: Coordinate multiple models, agents, and skills inside one native workspace.
about.workflowDescription: Ship code, manage files, run shell, and orchestrate MCP tools without losing context.

orchestration.title: Multi-agent orchestration
orchestration.desc: Run coordinated agent teams to decompose complex work.

sandbox.title: Local secure sandbox
sandbox.desc: Keep every file and secret local with auditable execution.

plugins.title: MCP & plugin ecosystem
plugins.desc: Connect MCP servers, skills, and third-party plugins seamlessly.

about.summary: OpenCowork unifies multi-model workflows, MCP servers, skills, and custom plugins inside one desktop experience so you can switch between Chat, Cowork, or Code modes while staying in control.

dialog.title: Quick Settings
dialog.subtitle: Fast model switching and parameter tuning
dialog.fastModelDesc: For title generation and SubAgent tasks

provider.title: AI Providers
provider.subtitle: Configure API keys and models for each provider
provider.noModelsHint: Fetch from API or add manually
provider.deleteProviderConfirm: Delete provider "{{name}}"? This cannot be undone.
provider.addCustomProviderDesc: Add a custom AI provider compatible with OpenAI or Anthropic protocol
provider.baseUrlHint: Base URL for the API endpoint
provider.proxyUrlHint: Custom endpoint for proxy or third-party compatible services
provider.thinkConfigDesc: Configure deep thinking parameters for model {{model}}
provider.thinkBodyParamsHint: Extra parameters merged into request body when Think is enabled
provider.thinkDisabledBodyParamsHint: Parameters merged into request body when Think is disabled, leave empty to skip
provider.forceTemperatureHint: Anthropic requires temperature=1, leave empty to not override
provider.thinkJsonObjError: Parameters must be a JSON object
provider.addModelDesc: Manually add a model and configure its parameters
provider.modelTypeOverrideHint: Leave unset to use the provider default (current: {{type}})
provider.modelCategoryHint: Tag how this model is used (chat, speech, embedding, image)
provider.oauthRequired: Please sign in with OAuth first
provider.channelAppTokenOptional: Public apps do not require an App Token

plugin.title: Plugins
plugin.subtitle: Configure and manage your messaging plugins
plugin.addPluginDesc: Choose a plugin provider to add.
plugin.systemPromptPlaceholder: Optional: set a custom system prompt for this plugin's auto-replies...
plugin.modelHint: Model used for auto-reply. Leave default to use the globally active model.
plugin.autoReplyDesc: Automatically reply to incoming messages using the Agent
plugin.streamingReplyDesc: Stream responses in real-time via CardKit (Feishu only)
plugin.autoStartDesc: Automatically start this plugin when the app launches
plugin.conversationsDesc: Plugin conversation history will appear here.
plugin.allowReadHomeDesc: Allow reading files under your home directory (~)
plugin.readablePathsDesc: Whitelist specific directories the plugin can read
plugin.allowWriteOutsideDesc: Allow writing files outside the plugin directory
plugin.allowSubAgentsDesc: Allow using Task and other sub-agent tools

toolsDesc.PluginSendMessage: Send a message via the plugin
toolsDesc.PluginReplyMessage: Reply to a specific message via the plugin
toolsDesc.PluginGetGroupMessages: Read recent messages from a chat/group
toolsDesc.PluginGetCurrentChatMessages: Read recent messages from the current plugin chat
toolsDesc.FeishuSendImage: Send an image to a Feishu chat
toolsDesc.FeishuSendFile: Send a file to a Feishu chat
toolsDesc.FeishuListChatMembers: List members in a Feishu chat (for @mentions)
toolsDesc.FeishuAtMember: Mention members in a Feishu group chat
toolsDesc.FeishuSendUrgent: Send an urgent push (app/sms) for a message
toolsDesc.FeishuBitableListTables: List tables in a Bitable app
toolsDesc.FeishuBitableListFields: List fields in a Bitable table
toolsDesc.FeishuBitableGetRecords: Read records from a Bitable table
toolsDesc.FeishuBitableCreateRecords: Create records in a Bitable table
toolsDesc.FeishuBitableUpdateRecords: Update records in a Bitable table
toolsDesc.FeishuBitableDeleteRecords: Delete records from a Bitable table

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.subtitle: Configure Model Context Protocol server connections
mcp.addServerDesc: Add a new Model Context Protocol server connection.
mcp.name: Name
mcp.autoFallbackDesc: Fall back to SSE if Streamable HTTP fails

skillsmarket.title: Skills Market
skillsmarket.subtitle: Configure the source for browsing and installing skills
skillsmarket.providerDesc: Select where to fetch skills from
skillsmarket.builtinDesc: Local bundled skills list (no API key required)
skillsmarket.builtinInfo: Uses the bundled skills.json shipped with the app. Skills are downloaded from their original GitHub repositories when installing.
skillsmarket.skillsmpInfo: Fetches the latest skills catalog from skillsmp.com. An API key is required. Visit skillsmp.com to create a free account and generate your key.
skillsmarket.apiKeyDesc: Your SkillsMP API key (starts with sk_live_...)
skillsmarket.apiKeyRequired: API key is required for SkillsMP provider.
skillsmarket.testDesc: Verify that the market provider is reachable and your API key is valid

websearch.title: Web Search
websearch.subtitle: Configure web search providers and settings
websearch.enableDesc: Allow the AI to search the web for current information
websearch.providerDesc: Select a search provider to use
websearch.apiKeyDesc: API key for the selected provider
websearch.baseUrlDesc: Custom base URL for the API (optional)
websearch.maxResultsDesc: Maximum number of search results to return
websearch.disabledError: Web search is disabled. Please enable it in settings.
websearch.apiKeyRequired: API key is required for this provider.
websearch.testSuccess: Web search test successful! Found {{count}} results.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.subtitle: Quick actions available throughout the app
shortcuts.inputHistory: Cycle sent history with up/down (caret at start/end)
